name: Grand Yield
description: A competitive farming game developed by a team of university students, in about 10 weeks, all working from home.  The goal of the game is to make more deliveries than your opponent, fulfilling randomized orders that arrive.  Use the shop to gain an advantage over your opponent, or steal their crops!  But if they catch you on their field, they'll kick you out.  Win more rounds than your opponent to harvest the Grand Yield and be victorious!
